title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 29 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 29 2022
description:
Buck hosts solo. Biden's Ministry of Disinformation teaches us the twin pillars of the Democrat Party are hypocrisy and hubris. New disinformation czar Nina Jankowicz sings Mary Poppins-themed song about disinformation. Buck says, "Soviet Mary Poppins is not somebody who should be in charge of anything." Psaki on Jankowicz. Elizabeth Warren suddenly wants new regulation of social media. DHS Secretary Mayorkas is, Buck states, "just full of it" and has no idea who's coming across the border, admits he fully supports amnesty. DeSantis blasts the Ministry of Truth. Buck takes call on the Fentanyl crisis.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
